mission "upgrade ships"
	job
	repeat
	name "(Upgrade Ships)"
	"description" "Combine a ship +3 base versions of that ship into one of a higher tier, up to a max of T10."
	color selected "ship_upgrades job: selected"
	color unselected "ship_upgrades job: unselected"
	source "su_planet1"
	on accept
		conversation
			label "start"
			label "menu"
			scene "scene/su_cats"
			`Ship Upgrade Menu`
			``
			`- only active ships in your fleet will be considered`
			`- on merging, all ship outfits are lost, and the new ship has the standard outfits multiplied by its tier.`
			``
			`i.e.: own 4 ships of the same kind and merge them into one T1 ship of that kind with doubled attributes/guns/turrets/bays/outfits.`
			`i.e.: own 3 ships of the same kind and one T4 of that kind, and merge it into one T5 ship of that kind with 6 times the attributes/guns/turrets/bays/outfits (of the base version).`
			``
			`The following ships can be merged into a higher tier:`
			choice
				`	merge 3x "Riptide" and 1x "Riptide (T9)" into a "Riptide(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Riptide" >= 3
						"ship model: Riptide (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Riptide (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Deep River Transport" and 1x "Deep River Transport (T9)" into a "Deep River Transport(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Deep River Transport" >= 3
						"ship model: Deep River Transport (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Deep River Transport (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Deep River" and 1x "Deep River (T9)" into a "Deep River(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Deep River" >= 3
						"ship model: Deep River (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Deep River (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Winter Gale" and 1x "Winter Gale (T9)" into a "Winter Gale(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Winter Gale" >= 3
						"ship model: Winter Gale (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Winter Gale (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Cool Breeze" and 1x "Cool Breeze (T9)" into a "Cool Breeze(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Cool Breeze" >= 3
						"ship model: Cool Breeze (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Cool Breeze (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Hurricane" and 1x "Hurricane (T9)" into a "Hurricane(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Hurricane" >= 3
						"ship model: Hurricane (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Hurricane (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Derecho" and 1x "Derecho (T9)" into a "Derecho(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Derecho" >= 3
						"ship model: Derecho (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Derecho (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Tempest" and 1x "Tempest (T9)" into a "Tempest(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Tempest" >= 3
						"ship model: Tempest (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Tempest (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Heavy Gust" and 1x "Heavy Gust (T9)" into a "Heavy Gust(T10)"`
					to display
						"ship model: Heavy Gust" >= 3
						"ship model: Heavy Gust (T9)" >= 1
					goto "Heavy Gust (T9)"
				`	merge 3x "Strong Wind" and 1x "Strong Wind (T9)" into a "Strong Wind(T10)"`
					to display
